data.name: Adventures in the Light & Dark
data.detailed_description:
Theo finds himself on the shore of a foggy island. From there, things only get stranger. Follow Theo into the twisted world of Phaser Reach, the Greatest Space Station North of the Harbor...

FEATURES

  • 20k word novel of mystery and humor
  • Playable in VR or Desktop mode
  • Surreal audiovisual surroundings
  • Automatically saves your spot

This product is a novel; gameplay is intended to be simple turning of pages. For the best experience, play in a seated position in a quiet environment. Some story content not suited for the easily disturbed.
